item.title: Prayer bpn11702 in Hausa
item.description: *Idan an zāɓi yin wannan salla, a bāyan an yi arwalla, sai a jā wannan āyā da sāfe, da rāna, kuma da dare kōwace rāna. *Ana tsaye, a jūya fuska wajen ƙibla, a cē : Allah yā tabbata cēwa, bābu wani Allah sai Shi. Daulōlin wahayi da halittu duka nāsa nē. A gaskiya, yā bayyana wanda shīnē asubāhin wahayi, wanda ya zanta bisa sinaï, wanda ta garēshi maɗaukakin haske ya haska, wanda ta garēshi itāciya mai martaba wanda bāyanta bābu wata hanya, kuma wanda ta garēsta aka yi wannan kira zuwa ga duk waɗanda suke sama da ƙasa cēwa: «Gā wanda shīnē mai kōwa mai kōmi yā iso.
